directions.step:
Date: Mon, 1 Apr 1996 22:32:01 -7
From: arlenes@holly.ColoState.EDU Scoop out pulp of zucchini halves. Heat pulp, onion, sauce and spices in a pan for 5 minutes. Add matzo meal to mixture and mix well. Restuff zucchini with mixture. Place in a baking dish with a little water on bottom. Bake at 450F for 30 minutes until zucchini shells are soft.
Posted by manicd@SIRIUS.COM (Jennifer Joseph) to the Fatfree Digest [Volume 16 Issue 16] Mar. 20, 1995.
